comments:
Default preprocessing for a sequence of sentences.

Creates two iterators:

- sentences padded and turned into sequences of `nltk.util.everygrams`

- sentences padded as above and chained together for a flat stream of words

:param order: Largest ngram length produced by `everygrams`. :param text: Text to iterate over. Expected to be an iterable of sentences: Iterable[Iterable[str]] :return: iterator over text as ngrams, iterator over text as vocabulary data
